sections.MISSION:
Squad Designated Marksmen from 1/2CR conduct Designated Marksmen University from 21-28 NOV 2023 in the Day Room of building 680 and at Range 117 IOT familiarize and qualify Soldiers on their assigned weapon systems.
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this training is to familiarize and qualify DMR personnel on the SQDN’s new designated marksmen rifles.
sections.KEY TASKS:
DMR Personnel will receive classroom instruction
ARM training
Urban training
Zero on assigned weapon systems
Qualify on assigned weapon systems
sections.END STATE:
All DMR personnel are qualified day and night with their assigned weapon systems.
Training Objectives
Ensure proper knowledge base with classroom learning
Zero weapons
Conduct weapons familiarization day/night
Conduct weapons qual day/night
Practical training on Range Estimation, Target Detection, and weapons maintenance.
Resourcing
OIC: LT Lowe RSO: SSG Kelley Ammo NCO: SGT Donian Driver: SPC Diaz TC: SGT Strand Gate Guard: PFC Garcia Gate Guard: PFC Aguilar Runner: PFC Morales
Chow: M / M
POC: SSG Kelley, Michael. Michael.r.kelley89.mil@army.mil
OBJ Angel
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
Transportation: Each Troop provides one Stryker to transport their personnel.
Arms Room: Coordinate with Troop armorers to have all weapons drawn in time for all personnel to be red-con 1 NLT 0830 on 27 November
sections.SUSTAINMENT:
CLIV: 6x MRE per 258 MRE total. 10x Water Cans
CLV: 3,100rds AA11, 5,000rds 5.56mm
PAX and Transportation
9 Shooters x per Troop + 10x Snipers + 1x Medic
1 FMTV + 2 Strykers + 1 MEV + 1 JLTV with trailer
Range Considerations
Range Down Time: 0500-0900/ 1800-2000
Day 1 NOV 21
Day 1 will be held in the Digital Training Facility
0800 Weapon Maintenance - SPC David
0900 Zero/ Weapon Set up - SPC Rodriguez
1000 Range Estimation – SGT Haldane
1200 Firing Positions – SPC Bowman, SGT Walton
1245 End for Thanksgiving dinner
Day 2 NOV 22
Day 2 will be held in the Digital Training Facility
0800 Night Shooting - SPC David
0900 Dry Fires – SPC Bowman, SGT Walton
1100 Moving Targets – SSG Kelley
1300 DMR Employment – SGT Haldane
Day 3 NOV 27
Day 3 will be conducted at Range 117
0730 Weapons draw
0800 Accountability
0830 SP
0900 Brief
1100 Firing Drills- beginning with grouping exercise with the M4, escalating to out to 500m shooting with M4, and group and zero with M110, culminating with out to 800m shooting with M110.
2100 Night Shooting- Beginning with M4 night shooting out to 300m culminating with M110 night shooting out to 600m
2359 Bed down
Day 4 NOV 28
Day 4 will be conducted at Range 117
0700 Wake up
0730 Hygiene/ Chow
0830 Practice Qual- All SMs will conduct 1 practice Qual individually engaging targets out to 800m
1100 Day Qual- All SMs will conduct 1 Qual individually engaging targets out to 800m
2100 Night Qual- All SMs will conduct 1 Qual individually engaging targets out to 800m
2200 Range Cold- Police Call
2300 Depart to Rose Barracks
